layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x194
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x194
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,16) size 784x162
      LayoutBlockFlow {P} at (0,0) size 784x24 [border: (3px solid #008000)]
        LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 237x18
          text run at (3,3) width 237: "This box should have a green border."

        LayoutText {#text} at (3,3) size 304x18
          text run at (3,3) width 304: "This box should have an identical green border."

        LayoutText {#text} at (32,32) size 530x18
          text run at (32,32) width 530: "Clockwise from top, the borders should be: PURPLE, GREEN, BLUE, YELLOW."
